properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PLAN_OPTION WHERE PLAN_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PLAN_OPTION P JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_ID LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND P.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT PLAN_NO , PLAN_TITLE , USER_ID , P.ENROLL_DATE , PLAN_COUNT FROM TB_PLAN_OPTION P JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y' AND PLAN_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY PLAN_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT PLAN_NO , PLAN_TITLE , USER_ID , P.ENROLL_DATE , PLAN_COUNT FROM TB_PLAN_OPTION P JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_ID LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY PLAN_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
